body:
Reddit doesn't display comment karma scores lower than -100. (eg. Even if you have -49,000 comment karma, it will still show up as -100 on your profile.) I'm currently not aware of such a feature on ruqqus.

So, who here has negative rep? And who here is [trying to get negative rep](https://ruqqus.com/post/mbp/how-to-sort-by-most-downvoted)?

So far, I've seen these users with pretty low rep scores:
* @ruqqusdies: -635 rep
* @EBayFreddyKruger: -2444 rep

Update: Admins changed it ([July 9th, 2020](https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/commit/46d4b6f0ffe942ecbf1dece99d4d19aa8e13b106#diff-4a088dbba4d5a2517b63ba2a534697fc)) :/

Now it's capped at -5 rep

So far, I've seen these users with pretty low rep scores:

  • @EBayFreddyKruger: -2444 rep

Update: Admins changed it (July 9th, 2020) :/

Now it's capped at -5 rep
title: Negative rep club

body: Those people were both racist assholes and trolls
body_html: Those people were both racist assholes and trolls

Content here may be yanked to other guilds.
